titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, March 23, 1948

mods.note: Robin Dean, Principal Houston Sayerwinnie, Announcer
mods.tableOfContents: Two Songs by Girl's Glee Club imaginary tour of Riverside School. Interviews on Dormitory life.. Schoolrooms. Vocation. Farm. Poultry. Dairy. Stock. Health. Recreation. Inter-tribal. Sports. Scouting. 4-H. Glee Club. Pep Club. Religious Education. Student Council. End with School Song.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
